articles.author: Rebecca Rubin
articles.title: Box Office: ‘Shazam: Fury of the Gods’ Stumbles With $30 Million Opening Weekend - Variety
articles.description: Shazam wasn’t the magic word at the weekend box office. “Shazam: Fury of the Gods” opened to No. 1 in North America, but the Warner Bros. and DC Comics sequel fell short of expect…
articles.content:
Shazam wasn’t the magic word at the weekend box office.
